name: capstone-planning
description: 1. A package.json file or .txt file with the modules you intend to use (look at Checkpoint 1)     - Use same package.json as Checkpoint 1 2. Use dotenv wiith secrets for your database connection     - Get new JWT_SECRET key from https://passwords-generator.org/ 2. DONE .gitignore file with node_modules and .env 4. Any assets you want to use (images, links, notes on folder structure, auth integration process, external APIs, etc.)
author: Joe Grobeck
